patterns: What do i need to build a computer?
What components does my pc need?
What parts do i need to build a pc?
what parts are in a computer?
what components does my computer need?
responses: A computer needs a CPU, Motherboard, Graphics card, RAM, storage drive or disk, power supply and a cabinet
A PC consists of a CPU, Motherboard, Graphics card, RAM, storage drive or disk, power supply and a cabinet
you'll need to buy a CPU, Motherboard, Graphics card, RAM, storage drive or disk, power supply and a cabinet to build a PC

AMD Ryzen 5600x is a great option for both gaming and multitasking

SSDs have recently gotten very affordable and are better than Hard disks, so you should SSDs that are at least 256 GBs in size
